title: Unexplainable lag when using another account on the same computer ( My brother's )

replies.body:
That's real weird! Other than Video/Audio settings that are saved server-side per-account, I can't think of anything between different accounts that would impact this. Without being in front of your computer and monitoring your system, we'll just have to chalk this up to an inconsistency in the symptoms showing up. Since you're seeing a fluctuation in your latency (ping), I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure this isn't caused by an incompatible local network setting.

Please let me know if the symptoms persist through those changes.

Sorry but I highly doubt the connection guide would help since on my account, it works perfectly, and on his, you only need to relog after the game starts. If there's nothing else you have in mind then I guess he'll just have to relog every time he goes ingame lol. Appreciate it though!
